title: Smithing apprentice

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Smithing apprentice (named Feoras) is one of several tutors stationed in Lumbridge. He provides information about Smithing to both new and advanced players. He is apprentice of the Master smithing tutor Sani in Varrock.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Smelting Tutor
Smithing apprentice
Released27 September 2006 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman
LocationLumbridge
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineFeoras looks a bit fiery.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3224

The Smithing apprentice (named Feoras) is one of several tutors stationed in Lumbridge. He provides information about Smithing to both new and advanced players. He is apprentice of the Master smithing tutor Sani in Varrock.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Click here for a list of other transcripts that this NPC speaks in.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • He is noticably shorter than normal male adult NPCs.
